articles.title: PSA: iPadOS 26 removes Split View and Slide Over multitasking features - 9to5Mac
articles.description: iPadOS 26 introduces a new windowing solution for iPad users, and in the process removes support for Split View and Slide Over.
articles.content: iPadOS 26 introduces major new windowing features designed to upgrade the iPads multitasking experience. But with those new features, two longstanding multitasking features have been removed: Split V… [+1654 chars]

articles.title: Apple stock dropped as WWDC got going. Here's why. - Business Insider
articles.description: Apple's stock suddenly dropped a few minutes into its WWDC keynote, highlighting relatively slow AI development compared to Big Tech rivals.
articles.content:
Apple shares suddenly dropped a few minutes into its WWDC keynote on Monday. The culprit appears to be one word: Siri.
About six minutes into the presentation, Apple's stock abruptly fell more than … [+2813 chars]
